page.title: 14PURLEY DOWNS GOLF COURSE
page.content: {PURLEY DOWNS GOLF COURSE Purley downs golf course is owned by Purley Downs golf club.Tony Jacklin and Bobby Lock have played there.It was built in 1890.Before the course was built,the land was farmland.To join the club it is Â£300 per year.You cannot rent balls or clubs.There are 18 holes.It is a private course.It has an average par of four and an average hole length of 317m.The longest hole is 449m,and the shortest is 107m.The out total(the first 9 holes)is 2781m The in total(the last 9 holes)is 2925m The total par is 70 but this can vary with your handicap.the address is 106 Purley Downs Road,Purley,CR2 ORB.The telephone no.is 01-657 1231
